Pinyin1: zhèjiàn shìqing wǒ huán zài kǎolǜ 。

Pinyin1: tā bùxiǎng líhūn ， dànshì zuìhòu háishi líhūn le 。

Translate1: He didn't want to divorce, but in the end he was divorced.

Pinyin1: fùmǔ bù tóngyì tā qù ， kěshì tā háishi qù le 。

Translate1: His parents did not agree with him, but he still went.

Pinyin1: yīshēng bùràng tā hējiǔ ， tā háishi hē 。

Translate1: The doctor did not let her drink, she still drank.

Pinyin1: lǎoshī shēngbìng le ， dànshì tā háishi lái shàngkè le 。

Pinyin1: tā zhèyàng shuō jiùshì bù xǐhuan wǒ 。

Pinyin1: biéhē tàiduō 。
Translate1: Don't drink too much.

Pinyin1: hējiǔ yǐhòu bié kāichē 。
Translate1: Don't drive after drinking.

Pinyin1: chīfàn de shíhou biéwán shǒujī 。
Translate1: Don't play your phone when eating.

Pinyin1: shàngkè de shíhou bié liáotiān 。
Translate1: Don't chat during class.

Pinyin1: tā duō gāo ？
Translate1: How tall?

Pinyin1: nǐjiā duōdà ？
Translate1: How old is your home?

Pinyin1: nǐ de háizi duōdà ？
Translate1: How old are you children?

Pinyin1: nǐjiā lí zhèr duōyuǎn ？
Translate1: How far is your home from here?

Pinyin1: nǐ yào zài měiguó dài duōjiǔ ？
Translate1: How long will you stay in the United States?

Pinyin1: zhèxiē dōngxi duōchóng ？
Translate1: How many things?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhīdào wǒmen xiànzài duōpàng ma ？
Chinese1: 你知道我们现在多胖吗？
Translate1: Do you know how fat we are now?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhīdào zhèlǐ de dōngtiān duōlěng ma ？
Chinese1: 你知道这里的冬天多冷吗？
Translate1: Do you know how cold the winter here is here?

Pinyin1: nǐ zhīdào shànghǎi de fángzi duōguì ma ？
Chinese1: 你知道上海的房子多贵吗？
Translate1: Do you know how expensive the house in Shanghai?

Pinyin1: wǒ yǒudiǎn è 。
Translate1: I'm a little hungry.

Pinyin1: zhège cài yǒudiǎn là 。
Translate1: This dish is a bit spicy.

Pinyin1: zuótiān yǒu yīdiǎn rè 。
Translate1: Yesterday it was a bit hot.

Pinyin1: shànghǎi de dōngtiān yǒu yīdiǎn lěng 。
Translate1: Winter in Shanghai is a little cold.

Pinyin1: wǒ dìdi yǒudiǎn pàng 。
Translate1: My brother is a bit fat.

Pinyin1: jīntiān yǒudiǎnlěi 。
Translate1: It's a little tired today.

Pinyin1: zhège yuè gōngsī yǒudiǎn máng 。
Translate1: The company was a bit busy this month.

Pinyin1: zhège dìfāng yǒudiǎn chǎo ， wǒmen zǒu bā 。
Chinese1: 这个地方有点吵，我们走吧。
Translate1: This place is a bit noisy, let's go.

Pinyin1: bàba huílai yǒudiǎn wǎn ， māma yǒudiǎn bù gāoxìng 。
Chinese1: 爸爸回来有点晚，妈妈有点不高兴。
Translate1: My father was a bit late, and the mother was a little unhappy.

Pinyin1: lǎoshī jīntiān yǒudiǎn bù shūfu ， suǒyǐ méi lái shàngkè 。
Chinese1: 老师今天有点不舒服，所以没来上课。
Translate1: The teacher was a bit uncomfortable today, so he didn't come to class.

Pinyin1: wǒjiā lí gōngsī hěnjìn 。
Translate1: My home is close to the company.

Pinyin1: měiguó lí zhōngguó hěn yuǎn 。
Translate1: The United States is far from China.

Pinyin1: zhège jiǔdiàn lí huǒchēzhàn hěnjìn 。
Chinese1: 这个酒店离火车站很近。
Translate1: This hotel is close to the railway station.

Pinyin1: nàgè jiǔbā lí zhèr tàiyuǎn le ， wǒ bùxiǎng qù 。
Chinese1: 那个酒吧离这儿太远了，我不想去。
Translate1: That bar is too far from here, I don't want to go.

Pinyin1: wǒ bùxiǎng qù líjiā hěnyuǎn de dìfāng gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 我不想去离家很远的地方工作。
Translate1: I don't want to work far away from home.

Pinyin1: nǐjiā lí chāoshì yuǎn ma ？
Translate1: Is your home far away from the supermarket?

Pinyin1: nǐ de dàxué lí nǐ lǎojiā hěnyuǎn ma ？
Chinese1: 你的大学离你老家很远吗？
Translate1: Is your university far away from your hometown?

Pinyin1: nǐmen gōngsī lí dìtiězhàn jìn ma ？
Chinese1: 你们公司离地铁站近吗？
Translate1: Is your company close to the subway station?

Pinyin1: nǐjiā lí xuéxiào duōyuǎn ？
Translate1: How far is your family from school?

Pinyin1: zhège jiǔdiàn lí jīchǎng yǒuduōyuǎn ？
Chinese1: 这个酒店离机场有多远？
Translate1: How far is this hotel from the airport?

Pinyin1: nǐ lí wǒ yuǎn diǎnr ！
Translate1: Far away from me!

Pinyin1: zhè liǎnggè yínháng nǎge gēngjìn ？
Translate1: Which two banks are closer?

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng zhǎo yīgè gēngshuài de nánpéngyou 。
Chinese1: 我想找一个更帅的男朋友。
Translate1: I want to find a more handsome boyfriend.

Pinyin1: wǒ xǐhuan zài wǎngshàng mǎi shū ， yīnwèi gēng piányi 。
Chinese1: 我喜欢在网上买书，因为更便宜。
Translate1: I like to buy books online because it is cheaper.

Pinyin1: bùyào tàigāoxīng ， wǒmen háiyǒu gēng duō de gōngzuò yào zuò 。
Chinese1: 不要太高兴，我们还有更多的工作要做。
Translate1: Don't be too happy, we have more jobs to do.

Pinyin1: jiéhūn yǐhòu ， tā biànde gēng piàoliang le 。
Chinese1: 结婚以后，她变得更漂亮了。
Translate1: After getting married, she became more beautiful.

Pinyin1: běijīng de fángzi bǐ shànghǎi gēngguì 。
Chinese1: 北京的房子比上海更贵。
Translate1: Beijing's house is more expensive than Shanghai.

Pinyin1: chūnjié bǐ zhōngqiūjié gēng rènao 。
Translate1: The Spring Festival is more lively than the Mid -Autumn Festival.

Pinyin1: hànzìxué qǐlai tǐng yǒuqù 。
Translate1: Chinese characters are very interesting.

Pinyin1: tā xiànzài de nǚpéngyou bǐ yǐqián de gēng piàoliang 。
Chinese1: 他现在的女朋友比以前的更漂亮。
Translate1: His girlfriend is more beautiful than before.

Pinyin1: zhōngguó de gāotiě bǐ fēijī gēng zhǔnshí 。
Chinese1: 中国的高铁比飞机更准时。
Translate1: China's high -speed rail is more timely than aircraft.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhēn hǎo ！
Translate1: It's so kind of you!

Pinyin1: nǐ nǚpéngyou zhēn piàoliang ！
Translate1: Your girlfriend is so beautiful!

Pinyin1: tājiā zhēn yǒuqián ！
Translate1: His family is really rich!

Pinyin1: xiǎogǒu zhēn kěài ！
Translate1: The puppy is so cute!

Pinyin1: jīntiān zhēnrè ！
Translate1: It's so hot today!

Pinyin1: nǐ māma zhēnài nǐ ！
Translate1: Your mother really loves you!

Pinyin1: wǒ zhēn xǐhuan zhù zài zhōngguó ！
Translate1: I really like to live in China!

Pinyin1: wǒ zhēn tǎoyàn zhèzhǒng nánrén ！
Translate1: I really hate this kind of man!

Pinyin1: nǐ zhēnhuì shuōhuà ！
Translate1: You are good at talking!

Pinyin1: nǐ zhēnnéng chī ！
Translate1: You can eat it!

Pinyin1: wǒ háihǎo 。
Translate1: I'm okay.

Pinyin1: nǐ zuò de cài huán kěyǐ 。
Translate1: You can make the dish.

Pinyin1: wǒmen lǎobǎn huán bùcuò 。
Translate1: Our boss is pretty good.
